Name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
Effect: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

Name: Oil Meets Fire
Effect: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

Name: Deepfry
Effect: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Guoba Mad
Effect: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Condensed Pyronado
Effect: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
